title: TEST - price request

freeDays.condition:
!!!Correct number of CNTs will be adjusted!!!


General
These terms and conditions are the basis for cooperation between carrier and DO & CO. Other terms and conditions shall not apply 

Scope and deadlines:
- Loading and unloading in the presence of the driver: 2 hours demurrage is included in the offer (Over sea (OS) & road). For AZE and RUS separate agreement will be met
- If the truck / CNT does not arrive within the agreed time, the claim for demurrage will lapse (OS & road)
- DO & CO and its material suppliers have to be promptly informed about any delay through Trasmate and by the phone (contacts are given in Trasmate or separately provided for events) (OS & road)
- If the dates/times are fixed, they are binding. Additional costs due to delays caused by forwarder will charged to him (100% of caused costs) (OS & road)
- For event transports: the deadlines for unloading-inbound and for loading-outbound are given by DO & CO. Deadlines for loading-inbound and unloading-outbound have to be agreed between the transport supplier and the respective material supplier (OS & road)
- For event transports: inbound for oversea transports: the forwarder offers DO & CO and its suppliers the two best loading dates, indicating the name of the ship, delivery times at the destination port and delivery times at the ring (OS)
- Demurrages and Detention Free Time (OS):
- Inbound port of origin > 14 days; Inbound port of destination > 14 days;
- Outbound port of departure > 21 days; Outbound port of origin > 14 days
- Demurrage and detention free time for refeer-CNTs will be agreed separately
- For event transports: Delivery in AUH does NOT take place via Jebel Ali. The delivery via Jebel Ali must be confirmed in writing by the DO & CO (OS)
- The special permits for the weekend trips to be organized by the freight forwarder and included in the transport costs (OS & road)
- All trailers / containers should not carry any empty pallets so that the entire loading area is available for DO & CO. The respective truck drivers must be present at loading and are responsible for cargo securing (OS & road)
- For event transports: Dispatch team available 24 hours (OS)
- Dispatch coordination has to be ensured by freight forwarder with a DO & CO team on site and with DO & CO Vienna Office as well
- For event transports: Number of trucks / CNTs per destination & material supplier can be adjusted (OS & road)
- Trucks cancellation / CNTs - 24 hours prior to loading is free of charge (OS & road)
- Ordering of an additional truck / CNT on the listed routes 24 hours before loading for the same price (OS & road)
- For event transports: Forwarder is responsible for customs clearance on the entire route (inbound / outbound both export / import). Costs for customs clearance are included in the transport price (OS & not EU events)
- For event transports: Carrier takes care of timely receiving of customs documents (F1 document package in excel) from each material supplier (DO & CO, Futurecom, Warmbold etc.)
- For event transports: The freight forwarder is responsible for the correctness of customs and transport documents
- For event transports: If, according to F1-documents, customs duties or taxes to be paid (consumer goods), DO & CO must be informed by freight forwarder in advance.  Previously not confirmed charges will not be accepted- Carrier has to provide following information into Transmate (EDI or manually):
 -- Estimated time of loading and delivery (stage block)
 -- Any delays caused by carrier (stage block)
 -- Truck number, CNT number, AWB number, B/L number (items block)
 -- Time confirmation (loading and delivery) (stage block)

Equipment/load securing:
- For road transports we accept (OS & road):
- only trucks with at least Euro 4 engines, with 13,6 ldm tautliners
- For oversea transport we only accept High Cube Containers (40 feet) and standard 20 feet CNTs
- Ordering of for Reefer CNTs goes separately
- It is very important that trucks/CNTs come with the necessary load securing equipment. If the necessary equipment is not available, DO & CO can equip trucks with its own equipment and charge costs to freight forwarder

The list of necessary load securing for road freight (trucks):
- Belts with ratchets, DAN 500 x 12 PCs
- Edge plastic protectors (jumbo/XL) x 24 PCs
- Wooden/aluminium side boards up to the top of trailer
- Aluminium fixing beams x 2 PCs

Opening hours:
- Unless otherwise agreed, the opening hours are from 9am to 5pm (OS & road)

Billing (OS & road): 
- All prices are all-in prices (door-to-door) incl. customs clearance and all other additional costs excluding demurrages
- demurrages and other not planned charges (not included in the transport costs, e.g. cancellation costs), are usually to be billed directly to material supplier (DO & CO, Futurecom, Röder, Warmbold etc.)
- Any additional extra charges (such as demurrage, cancellation costs, etc.) must be confirmed by DO & CO in writing
- Billing: per direction (in-/outbound), per supplier (DO & CO, Futurecom etc.)
- To the e-mail addresses: invoice.uk@doco.com, invoice.lon@doco.com, transport@doco.com
- A final transport overview (for Inbound & Outbound) must be transmitted to DO & CO before the invoices are issued. This overview is the basis for invoicing for both sides

Claims (OS & road):
In the case of a damage caused by transport, settlement/coordination takes place between the forwarding company and the respective material supplier (DO & CO, Futurecom, Röder, Warmbold etc.)

Jurisdiction: Vienna

Applicable law: Austria
